original: Saraṇaṁ savitakkasavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasavitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: saraṇam sa vitakka sa vicāram dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na sa vitakka sa vicāraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Araṇaṁ savitakkasavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaraṇo nasavitakkasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: araṇam sa vitakka sa vicāram dhammam paṭicca na araṇaḥ na sa vitakka sa vicāraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate cattāri.
analyzed: hetuyā cattāri ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate cattāri

original: Saraṇaṁ avitakkavicāramattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naavitakkavicāramatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate cattāri.
analyzed: saraṇam a vitakka vicāra mattam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na a vitakka vicāra mattaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā cattāri ārammaṇe dve pe vipāke ekam pe avigate cattāri

original: Araṇaṁ avitakkaavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naavitakkaavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: araṇam avitakka avicāram dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na avitakka avicāraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
